name: Trials of Harschacon
description:
Put your combat and platforming skills to the test in this two player Commodore 64-inspired fighting game. 

The first warrior to score a hit on their opponent wins the round, and the warrior with the most hits wins the game! 

  • Fast-paced gameplay 
  • Three unique arenas 
  • Local multiplayer 
  • Keyboard and Xbox controller support

Our Team
